questions.question: What is this platform used for?
questions.answer: This platform is designed to manage group assignments online. Users can create assignments, collaborate in groups, submit work, and review each other's submissions.

questions.question: Who can create assignments?
questions.answer: Assignments can be created by registered users with creator or instructor roles. They can set deadlines, add resources, and assign groups.

questions.question: Can students submit assignments individually?
questions.answer: Yes. Students can either submit individually or as part of a group, depending on the assignment settings configured by the creator.

questions.question: How does peer review work?
questions.answer: Peer review allows students to evaluate each other's assignments. Reviewers can leave comments, give scores, and provide feedback as part of the learning process.

questions.question: Is my data and submission secure?
questions.answer: Absolutely. All submissions are stored securely, and user data is protected using industry-standard security measures.

questions.question: Can I edit an assignment after submitting?
questions.answer: You can edit or resubmit your work before the deadline. After the deadline, submissions are locked unless allowed by the assignment creator.
